metadata.title: CVE-2023-29450 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: JavaScript pre-processing can be used by the attacker to gain access to thefile system (read-only access on behalf of user "zabbix") on the ZabbixServer or Zabbix Proxy, potentially leading to unauthorized access tosensitive data.

criterions.comment: zabbix package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
